nodes.text: R4-GL was the designation of a battle droid located inside the Network Security District on Nar Shaddaa, where it was destroyed around 3643 BBY.

R4-GL appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion world boss on Nar Shaddaa. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
